碞字的基本解释

碞
yán
古同“岩”，山石高峻。
僭越，超过本分。

碞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》五咸切，平咸，疑。］
(1)山石高峻貌。
(2)指山崖或岩石、岩洞。
(3)参差不齐貌。引申为僭越；超过本分。

碞字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　碞； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页832第25
【廣韻】五咸切【集韻】【正韻】魚咸切【韻會】疑咸切，?音諴。【說文】磛碞也。【書·召誥】用顧畏于民碞。【註】碞，險也，顧視民情之碞險。【正字通】言民情參差不齊，會碞險可畏意。孔傳訓僭謂小民僭差禮義，誤也。　又【韻會】魚音切，音吟。義同。　【正字通】與嵒巖同。

碞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
碞字的起名意思

暂无。

cliff
Basic explanation of words
cliff
yán
In ancient times, the "rocks" are high and steep.
Overstepping, exceeding duty.
cliff
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" five salty cuts, flat salty, suspicious. ]
(1) The mountains and rocks are high and steep.
(2) Refers to cliffs or rocks or caves.
(3) Uneven appearance. The extension is arrogant; beyond duty.
cliff
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　碞; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 832 25
[Guangyun] Five salty cuts [Jiyun] [Zhengyun] Salted fish cuts [Yunhui] Suspected salty cuts,? [Said the text] 磛磛碞 also. 【Book·Zhaogao】Using Gu to fear the people. [Note] Hazard is also dangerous, considering the hazard of public sentiment. [Zhengzitong] The sentiments of the people and the people are uneven, which can be dangerous and fearful. Kong Chuanxun arrogantly said that the small people arrogate courtesy and righteousness, which is also wrong.　[Yunhui] Yuyin cut, Yinyin. The same meaning.　【Zhengzitong】Same as Yanyan.
cliff
